title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby orders as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Remote Meetings and Remote Hearings 
of State Body – Adoption Authority of Ireland) Order 2020.

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby orders as follows:
heading: In this Order “the Adoption Authority of Ireland” means the body
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “the Adoption Authority of Ireland” means the body 

established by section 94 of the Adoption Act 2010.

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby orders as follows:
heading: GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister
text_raw:
2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister 
 for Children and Youth Affairs, 

4 September, 2020. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children and Youth Affairs. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th September, 2020.

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), hereby orders as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Instrument designates the Adoption Authority of Ireland as a state body for 
the purposes of holding remote meetings under section 29 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

This Instrument also designates the Adoption Authority of Ireland as a body for 
the purposes of holding remote hearings under section 31 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [335]
